info.name: api_location
info.description: Location of the Cherwell API (URL up to /CherwellAPI)

info.name: client_id
info.description: Client Id for the Cherwell API

info.name: client_secret
info.description: Client Secret (might not be needed and can be left blank)

info.name: username
info.description: Username that has access to the Cherwell API

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
